name: Oranges, Olives and Onion
recipeCategory: easy, quick, weekday, salads and dressings
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, low cholesterol, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, olives, orange, side dish, summer
recipeIngredient: 4 medium or large black Italian, French or Greek olives

recipeInstructions.text: In a serving bowl mix oil and vinegar.
Peel oranges with knife to remove pith along with skin; slice. Add to bowl.
Pit olives. Cut up and add to bowl.
Stir onion into bowl, mixing all the ingredients well.
